item.title: Roche Apprenticeship Indentures, 1756-1836
item.description: Apprenticeship indentures form Roche parish, transcribed by a volunteer as part of the 'Clay Country' project. The indentures give the name and age of the apprentice and the trade they will be the learning, parents' names, the name and occupation of the master and the names of the churchwardens, overseers of the poor and the Justices of the Peace. Other details from the register of apprentices are also given when available
item.dc:creator: AliceI
